panels.narration: MEANWHILE IN #MZX: regarding Cave Story (Doukutsu Monogatari)

right.text: .. doing crack.. not smoking.. can you SMOKE crack :\

left.text: The game is only a few months old anyway, and I've been very busy those months. We're not ZZTers who sit around all day smoking crack and playing the latest retro games.
Whatever, I'm really tired. I shouldn't have to wake up early on Spring break. But I do.

panels.narration: I shouldn't have to wake up early on spring break. Because I need to stay up late so I can insult ZZTers to all my idiot online friends for no reason.

left.text: Can you? Well I dunno what ZZTers tend to do with it. They probably take it up the ass or something.
